about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES


  • Multi-choice, single-ending with 2+ hours till credits

STORY


—“In the depths of the labyrinth, paradise waits."

Etched in your memory, only a riddle remains.

You, a budding adventurer, arrive in town to conquer this dungeon.

The local adventurers’ guild wastes no time in evaluating your skills, then offers you a tantalizing proposal...!

CHARACTERS



Paladin

High stamina and defensive abilities with skills that excel at defending allies. Her strength is also rather high, making her an effective physical attacker as well.

Signature Skills
- Holy Strike: Strikes a single enemy with a holy attack.
- Magic Guard: Reduces magic damage received by all allies for two turns.


Witch

An enchantress who uses offensive and support spells. Her speed is quite high, so it’s easy for her to make the first move.

Signature Skills
- Sleeping Snow: Inflicts magical ice damage on all enemies, putting them to sleep.
- Magic Dispense: Shares the user's own MP with the rest of the party.


Priestess

Able to use magic that heals allies. Also able to attack physically with blunt weaponry.

Signature Skills
- Heal: Restores a small amount of an ally’s HP.
- Swing: Attacks all enemies by swinging a mace around in a wide arc.


Scout

Moves quickly and uses skills that are advantageous for dungeon exploration. Also able to deal great damage when attacking from hiding.

Signature Skills
- Hide: Makes the user harder to target by increasing physical and magical evasion by 50%. Effect ends when the user takes damage from an attack. While hiding, the user’s physical attacks do 1.5x more damage.
- Backstab: Attacks a single enemy from behind.


Monk

A speedy front guard fighter. Average strength, but high stamina. Can also attack all enemies at once, making her a useful ally.

Signature Skills
- Leg Sweep: Inflicts damage on all enemies, knocking them off balance.
- Performance: Attacks all enemies with a magnificent dance. Also relaxes all allies, slightly restoring their MP.


Shamaness

A magic user that specializes in spells that weaken enemies’ abilities. Displays her true strength when facing powerful enemies.

Signature Skills
- Armor Curse: Lowers all enemies’ Defense. Can be stacked up to two times.
- Weak Fire: Reduces a single enemy’s flame resistance.


Sniper

Specializes in shooting down enemies with a high-powered bow. Her low speed and defense are compensated for with top-class strength.

Signature Skills
- Aim: Makes the user easily targeted by the enemy, but increases accuracy and critical rate.
- Quick Draw: 30% chance to attack all enemies at the start of battle.


Healer

An unmatched expert in healing. Your restorative needs are sure to be covered with her at your side. On the other hand, her offensive capabilities are rather slim in comparison.

Signature Skills
- Benediction: Gradually restores all allies' HP to full.
- Sanctuary: Doubles recovery effects for all allies for four turns.


Dancer

Emboldens allies with her beautiful dances. Also knows how to use blades, and slices through enemies with splendid form.

Signature Skills
- Spirit Dance: Increases all allies’ Magic Attack. Can be stacked up to two times.
- Brainy Dance: Regenerates all allies’ MP for four turns.


Alchemist

Excels at utilizing items. Requires specific materials, but is a jack-of-all trades who can attack, support, and heal.

Signature Skills
- Healing Potion: Consumes one Potion to restore all allies' HP.
- Poison Slow: Consumes one Poison Bottle to inflict non-elemental magical damage on all enemies while also poisoning them.


Rune Knight

A magical knight who imbues weapons with elemental properties of fire, ice, and lightning. Her abilities are average, but she's extremely strong against enemies with weaknesses.

Signature Skills
- Ice Sword: Strikes a single enemy with a physical ice attack.
- Fire Weapon: Grants one ally fire properties for four turns.


Sorceress

A sorceress with exceptional magic attack power, specializing in offensive magic. Can also improve the physical strength of her companions.

Signature Skills
- Icicle: Inflicts magical ice damage on all enemies, lowering their Strength.
- Power Up: Enhances an ally’s Strength. Can be stacked up to two times.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional crude humor, crass language. All love interests are 18 years of age or older.

name: Labyrinth Flowers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL VRAM 1 GB or more
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL VRAM 1 GB or more
